segments.text: Ugh, the sink is gushing water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is disgusting, spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets; what a nasty mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is wobbling in the wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's digging into the cookie jar like it's clean or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand is out, probably to touch those soggy cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's going to be sticky and wet now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how careless they're being with the hygiene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene turns my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby might get splashed too.
segments.speaker: PAR
